result.reason: Enhancement to fully persist custom panel layouts (names, positions, connections-per-panel) across restarts — basic layout infrastructure exists but doesn't restore custom panels or reconnect sessions to them
result.approach: Extend DockPanelLayoutSerializer to persist custom panel names and their dock positions in the layout XML; update DockPanelLayoutLoader to recreate named panels on startup; store each connection's panel assignment in confCons.xml and reconnect sessions to their saved panels on load

attempts.raw_output:
